content:
As you leave the rugged mountains and continue on your journey, you reach the next realm, the Hod, or glory, which represents communication and self-expression. This realm is characterized by misty mountains, hidden caves, and mysterious temples. It's a place where you will be able to confront your own voice and overcome any obstacles that block your self-expression.

As you journey through the realm of Hod, you will encounter various obstacles that block your path, but you are ready to face them with the victory and strength that you have gained on your journey so far.

Do you:

1. Follow the path that leads to the misty mountains
2. Follow the path that leads to the hidden caves
3. Follow the path that leads to the mysterious temples
4. Look for another way around

Please select one of the above options by typing the corresponding number.
